alert.note: Alert for Candler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:44PM EDT until August 08 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF EVANS...BULLOCH...CANDLER AND TATTNALL COUNTIES... At 644 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bellville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Claxton, Hagan, Daisy, Bellville, and Manassas. This warning includes I-16 between mile markers 114 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
